etymology.description: Depicts a hat or crown -> original form of 帽(帽) (mào, "hat")
etymology.interpretation: 冃(mào) was originally used to depict a hat or crown, reflecting its pictographic representation. Over time, it evolved to denote a more general concept of hats, leading to the creation of 帽(帽) (mào, "hat"), where 冃 became ⺜.
